snippet: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said that Syria delivered two consignments of chemical weapons last week and that another significant shipment was expected this week.
abstract: Syrian government, which missed original December 31 deadline for shipping its most toxic chemical weapons overseas for destruction, has sped up deliveries and proposed finishing job by end of April; while some call acceleration of shipments good progress, others are dissatisfied with new timetable.
lead_paragraph: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said that Syria delivered two consignments of chemical weapons last week and that another significant shipment was expected this week.

headline.main: Syria Speeds Its Deliveries of Chemicals for Disposal
headline.print_headline: Syria Speeds Its Deliveries of Chemicals for Disposal
